entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: DefaultInterpolatedStringHandler - expose buffer and reset #110505
  • [API Proposal]: M.E.C.M. MemoryCache - add ReadOnlySpan<char> get API #110504
  • dotnet run leaves Linux terminal in broken state after unhandled exception following Console.ReadLine #110502
  • IDN test failure on .NET 8.0 #110499
    8.0.x
  • ClientWebSocket ReceiveAsync infinite await #110496

Closed

  • [nativeaot] nativeaot how can I deploy to run on buildroot #110500
  • Backport System.Globalization.Extensions.Tests for icu 74/unicode 15.1 #110498
    8.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • Added a fix for the build failure when STRESS_DYNAMIC_HEAP_COUNT is defined. #110506
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add support for DOTNET_DiagnosticPortDefaultPrefix #110503
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Propagate assertions into natural loops in global morph #110501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • JIT: add more "simple" complexity helpers #110486
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [debugger] Fix a step that becomes a go #110484
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Updating xarch to utilize EVEX compares and blending where possible #110342
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix UNC paths #110033
    area-Host
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Ensure that we don't try and optimize masks for promoted fields #110485
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • release/9.0-staging -- Update Alpine, Debian, and Fedora versions #110493
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.x
  • release/8.0-staging -- Update Alpine and Fedora versions #110492
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Normalization APIs using the spans #110465
    area-System.Globalization, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [cdac] Handle no method def token when trying to get the IL version state #110449
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [cDAC] Implement GCCover portion of SOSDacImpl::GetMethodDescData #110322
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add Alpine and Ubuntu versions #110476
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix C++/CLI applications which use __declspec(appdomain) #110495
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #110481
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • New GC decommit strategy for large/huge regions #109431
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Re-enable bundle archive building in source build #110448
    blocked, blocking, area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Workload Feature Band Test Sometimes Fails #45314
  • Template engine tests hitting known parallelism issue in GetVisualStudioInstances #44878
  • error MSB3231: Unable to remove directory #42963
  • Track signature errors #42870
  • ToolInstallCommandTests.WhenRunWithRoot is flaky #42346
  • Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests are pulling from Docker Hub #42026
  • VMR CI build failures during restore: feed download failed #41590
  • Package reference alias tests are disabled #39172
    Backlog
  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • Visual Studio Installer removes 8.0 SDK #45241
  • Could not upgrade projects to new 2.2.100 sdk getting conflict warnings #2721
    Discussion
  • `slnx` support in the `dotnet` CLI #40913
    9.0.2xx

PullRequests

Created

  • sln-add: Only add guid on slnv12 files #45366
    untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45365
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow

Merged

  • [release/9.0.2xx] [dotnet-format] Include the .NET Framework buildhost executable in the SDK. #45321
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • make the workload resolver only light up for the specific entrypoint SDKs we control #41268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fixes middleware invocation arguments use by legacy apply update code path #45298
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use legacy WASM APIs when newer ones are not available #45317
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Remove global usings from projects building source packages #45339
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Restore detailed test logging to console output #45343
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change the Windows dev versions leg to x86 #45362
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix BuildPass>1 artifacts and asset manifest content #45323
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
    Area-Infrastructure, 10.0.1xx

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Compilation error involving dynamic parameter not being detected #76322

Closed

  • Use primary constructor (and remove fields) removes code comments #69012
    Backlog
  • IDE0031: Null check can be simplified. Use null propagation does nothing. #66141
    Backlog
  • IDE0047 should not appear in pattern-match expression when-clause of switch-case. #75203
    17.13
  • Value Tracking should ignore optional parameters that aren't specified #66771
    Backlog
  • IOperation SetParent Race Condition #35818
    Backlog
  • Allow any viable types to be used in "Move static members" and warn before creating a class #70896
    Backlog
  • "Move static members" prepends the current namespace twice after the textbox is edited #70895
    Backlog
  • Move to namespace screws up document formatting #54889
    Backlog
  • Move type to file copies parent class #64066
    18.0
  • IDE2001 codefix is offered but does nothing #66017
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Generate delegating constructor should make the implicit no-arg constructor explicit to preserve binary and source compat #76330
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Filter out inaccessible attributes when generating default constructors #76329
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Unify user experience with disparate 'generate constructor' features #76328
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add f1 item for global usings #76327
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Center the symbol being navigated to when navigating through doc-outline #76326
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Attempt to reuse 'nameof' expressions in attributes when converting from a local function to a method #76325
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update add/remove accessibility modifiers for interfaces #76324
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix broken 'convert if to switch' case with recursive analysis #76317
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Improve formatting in 'convert anon type to tuple' #76315
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Preserve comment inside class body when switching to primary constructor #76319
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Handle trivial case in 'use null propagation' #76321
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Do not remove parentheses when it would cause a parsing change in a 'when clause' #76320
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Change value tracking to verify a parameter is used when mapping from that parameter to it's callers #76318
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Use TotalMilliseconds instead of TimeSpan in delay telemetry #76309
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Fix issue with vb's "move type" moving more than just the type requested. #76295
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix formatting of an empty statement on the same line as another statement #76311
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix duplicated namespace in the 'move static member' dialog #76314
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, VSCode, Next
  • Allow moving static members between different type kinds #76313
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Do not format nodes when only changing their namespace name. #76294
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update SystemTextJsonVersion #76273
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Fix issue where structure tag could get stuck at the wrong location #76194
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Update the Copilot powered Inline Rename UX #76001
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Cache the MEF composition in the Roslyn LSP. #76276
    Area-IDE, LSP, VSCode
  • Mark interceptors feature as stable and deprecate file path based attributes #76312
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Interceptors
